raw akas.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day

akas: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day USA (new title)
akas from release info: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day USA (new title)

1.title: Talking Thirty

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Rachael Ray makes five make-ahead meals including Sausage Ragu with Pappardelle, Mushroom Soup with Marsala, Zucchini Potato and Fennel Stew, Chicken Thighs in Mild Red Curry and Turkey and Chorizo Chili.

2.title: Ahead of the Game

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: On the menu: beef goulash with blue cheese; toasted spaghetti minestra with Tuscan kale; sweet sausage and eggplant penne; boneless chicken chasseur; tomato soup served with grilled cheese on pumpernickel bread.

3.title: Budget Minded

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Five budget-friendly recipes, including parsnip-and-potato soup; baked beans and knock-wurst; bean ragu with linguine; chicken soup with green beans and tarragon; and a croque-monsieur pie.

4.title: It Goes Both Ways

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: On the menu: one-pot Hungarian pork; pork-and-cider stew; soup with broken spaghetti and escarole; green-harissa chicken thigh; and chicken with porcini gravy and polenta.

5.title: Roll It on Over

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: On the menu: buttermilk brine for turkey; turkey-corn chowder with bacon and chipotle; pilgrim casserole; redeye stew made with turkey and poblano; beef picadillo; and a beef-bacon-onion sauce with bucatini.

6.title: Episode #7.6

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: What's Cooking?

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: These five aromatic meals will make you ask, "Mmmm, what's cooking?" The meals include roast chicken with garlic gravy, portobello-and-porcini cacciatore; sausage-and-broccoli rabe soup; and rice pilaf with chorizo casserole.

2.title: You Learn Something New Every Day

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Prepared: slow-roasted lamb with roasted tomatoes, braised potatoes and artichokes hearts; and a Portuguese fish supper.

3.title: The World in a Day

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Let your taste-buds travel the world with five mouthwatering meals, including chicken pot pie; Louisiana-style ribs.

4.title: Take the Slow Road

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Going to make a slow-cooked supper? Might as well make it for the week. Dishes include brisket with mushroom-sage polenta; fisherman's stew; chicken divan casserole; zucchini chili; and barbecue-brisket sandwiches.

5.title: Week of Comfort

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Cook five comfort food classics that you can put together in a single day. On the menu: linguine and clam sauce; baked ziti; spinach and veal; vegetable-and-dumpling soup; and spaghetti and meatballs.

6.title: One Pot Week

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: One-pot meals include chicken and mushrooms; sausage, peppers and onions; cauliflower, macaroni and cheese; minestra with beef-and-pork polpette; and nacho-topped chili.

7.title: Thanksgiving Anytime

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Rachael makes four dishes that bring Thanksgiving to the table anytime.

8.title: From a Taco to Morocco

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Spice up your week with five eclectic comfort food dishes. Prepared: braised pork tacos; crab-cake macaroni-and-cheese; Moroccan meat loaf w/lemon-honey gravy & zucchini couscous; ratatouille w/poached eggs & garlic croutons; & pork ragu.

9.title: Something for Everyone

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Cook five different dishes to satisfy every appetite in your house. Prepared: Spanish-stuffed braciola; Spanish chicken-and-rice soup; spinach-and-artichoke baked pasta; meatless chili; open-faced sausage, pepper and onion sandwiches.

10.title: Holi-Week

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Five no fuss meals that'll have your whole family feeling jolly, including Italian-style roast beef; Portobello cream sauce with whole-wheat linguini; stuffed eggplant; curry lentil soup; barbecued-beef sandwiches; a Caprese salad.

11.title: Stick to Your Ribs

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Rachael creates suppers that you can whip out in a single afternoon. Roast pork and potatoes with mushrooms and kale; corn-and-crab-chowder potpies; steak hoagies with homemade steak sauce.

12.title: Hearty Classics

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Rachael shows you five hearty classics you can make in a single day. Dishes: short ribs; turkey-stuffing meat loaf and mashed potatoes with herbs; portobella-and-spinach Bolognese; and green pastitsio.

13.title: One for All

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: One simple recipe can get you started on fixing well-balanced meals. Three-bean minestrone; roasted-tomato marinara w/spaghetti squash; Spanish "hunter's chicken"; Mexican-style pesto w/rice or whole-grain pasta; and eggplant-parm stacks.

14.title: Stew on This

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Mexican stew gives you a head-start on a week's worth of comfort food. Prepared: a Mexican stew; pork posole with pickled onions and queso fresco; chicken and cider; Moroccan meatballs with eggs; chili; and pappardelle with pulled pork.

15.title: That's Comforting

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Five nights of comfort food - that you can make in a single day. Included: gumbo; Hungarian-style shepherd's pie; BLT chicken soup; mushroom-and-Burgundy stew; and arroz con pollo.

16.title: Mix & Match

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Rachael's five mix & match meals include chicken-noodle soup; barbecued pulled chicken with a blue-cheese-and-cornbread topping; lasagna with a lamb ragu; spinach and ricotta; zucchini, pepper and potato soup; and eggplant-and-squash curry.

17.title: I Offer You the World

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Get a week's worth of meals from all over the map. Prepared: Mexican beef stew; shrimp and chorizo; Hungarian Portobello paprikash; German-style sweet-and-sour red-cabbage soup; French-style chicken in a pot; and mashed Camembert potatoes.

18.title: Slow Ride

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Rachael whips up jaw-dropping slow-cooked dishes, including roast pork with apple chutney; sweet potatoes and sautéed chard; braised chicken with mushrooms; braised beef; penne with ceci sauce; and turkey chili.

19.title: It's a Breeze

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Get 5 low-maintenance meals for the lazy person who lives inside everyone. Meals include roasted root-vegetable soup with grilled-cheese croûtons; black-bean chilaquiles; roasted-pepper-and-eggplant marinara; beef-and-pork tamale pie.

20.title: Make a Double Batch

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Get recipes that are a hit; you'll want to make a double batch of these. Recipes include classic Bolognese; beer-braised chicken thighs; lamb-and-rice stuffed peppers; sausage-kale-and-lentil soup; roasted tomato-and-garlic puttanesca.

21.title: One Is the Magic Number

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: Here's a promise: in one hour, you'll get one week's worth of food.

1.title: Bold Thinking

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Bold dishes are prepared, including southern Italian-style short ribs; veal paprikash; polenta with four cheeses and a cucumber salad; turmeric-and-cumin chicken; and beef and broccoli.

2.title: Mexican Made Ahead

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Salsa-marinated chicken with Mexican rice; savory-and-sweet-pork stew with ancho chilies; escarole soup; asparagus-and-pistachio pesto; and vindaloo for chicken or lamb.

3.title: Make It Work

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Prepared: spaghetti with bacon-and-beef sauce; chicken and penne with fennel-and-cream sauce; barbecue pulled-chicken sandwiches; minestrone soup with sweet sausage; and mushroom-and-marsala casserole with a polenta crust.

4.title: Fresh Start

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Prepared: chicken with carrots and peas; red clam chowder; yellow-tomato gazpacho with tuna salad; and risotto stuffed peppers and zucchini.

5.title: Dinner and Dessert

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Chicken-noodle soup; penne alla vodka; roast-pork shoulder sandwiches with fennel slaw; veal-and-spinach manicotti; chicken succotash; and profiteroles.

6.title: Better Yet

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Prepared: fra diavolo sauce, seafood and pasta; Thai ribs and chicken legs; roasted chicken with potatoes and artichokes; lentil-and-mushroom soup; and glazed chicken breasts.

7.title: 4 Star Dinner

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Prepared: roast-beef French dips with green-pea pesto; Cobb-style meat loaf; poached-tuna melts; black-bean-and-beef chili with green sour cream; sausage-and-spinach egg strata.

8.title: Souper Star Suppers

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Italian chicken soup w/ porcini; portabellas and peppers; pulled pork w/ tamale potpie; BBQ chicken; red-bean-and-corn chowder; apple-and-celery-root soup w/ a grilled cheddar, bacon and honey-mustard sandwich; and beef stew w/ horseradish.

9.title: Fall in Love with Fall

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Pork goulash with apples and onions; beer-braised beef meatballs with horseradish sauce; lentil soup with kale and sausage; barbecue turkey mini-meatloaf with mashed sweet potatoes; and pumpkin lasagna.

10.title: Meatlovers' Lane

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: On the menu: veal-and-pork meatballs with mushroom gravy and egg noodles; black-pepper beef; soup with sausage, pumpkin and rice; stuffed peppers with broken meatballs and rice; roast pork loin with kale and polenta.

11.title: A Chicken in Every Pot

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Chicken dishes include chicken tetrazzini casserole; tequila orange barbecue chicken burritos; mulligatawny; Catalan chicken stew; and braised chicken thighs with garlic.

12.title: Double Take

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Dishes include pork-tenderloin posole; spaghetti with meat sauce; Mexican chorizo strata; French-onion-soup-topped French-bread pizzas; and Reuben-style shepherd's pie.

13.title: 2 for 1

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Creamed chicken with tarragon on buttered toast; cold chicken curry with toasted almonds and crystallized ginger; Mediterranean bean-and-bacon soup; stewed chicken thighs.

1.title: Star Ingredient

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Garlic-flavored dishes are prepared, including sliced steak & mushroom barley soup; Portuguese chicken & potatoes; three-cheese baked penne with sausage; roasted butternut & zucchini chili pot; and Swiss chard au gratin French bread pizzas.

2.title: Prepare Yourself

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Prepared: stuffed-chicken saltimbocca; roasted red-pepper minestrone; paella-style casserole; roasted-squash chili mac; Middle Eastern roasted chicken.

3.title: Border Bonanza

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Five Tex-Mex meals are prepared. Featured: chicken enchiladas; green chili sloppy joes; Mexican brisket 'n biscuits; black-bean-and-beef chilaquiles with fried eggs; jalapeno popper orzo mac-n-cheese with guacamole salad.

4.title: Back to the Grind

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Iconic American foods get a modern day makeover. Recipes featuring ground beef include veal dumplings with escarole in broth; sloppy-joe-and-macaroni casserole; pilgrim meatloaf with cider gravy; pork chili with polenta; and moussaka.

5.title: Wintry Mix

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Tortilla soup; eight-spice squash; chicken-thighs stew with lentil rice; creamy winter-vegetable soup; portabello mushrooms; hot-and-sweet-pepper ragu with pappardelle.

6.title: Noodle This

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Chinese spaghetti and meatballs; pulled-chicken ragu and rigatoni; roasted butternut boats stuffed with sausage; toasted pasta and rice; creamy chicken and noodles; lasagna with roasted eggplant-ricotta filling.

7.title: Five Fiesta Favorites

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Prepared: Mexican chorizo and turkey chili; chicken in pumpkin-seed sauce; pork with chilies and orange sauce; sliced chipotle turkey breast with pomegranate-cranberry relish and polenta; poblano mac and manchego with corn and mushrooms.

1.title: Get Saucy

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Mustard-and-brown-sugar BBQ beef sandwiches with celery slaw; Genovese red sauce; hot-and-sweet pepper-curry sauce; drunken chicken; Bonnie's Italian stew.

2.title: Soupercharged

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Greek split-pea soup with lemon; tomato soup with roasted peppers; smoky clam chowder; andouille and roasted squash gumbo; cauliflower soup with anchovy bread-crumb topping.

3.title: Diner Lovers' Week

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Diner-style hot-turkey sandwiches; cheeseburger chili; tuna-melt macaroni and cheese; turkey-club-enchilada casserole; Greek-diner meat-and-spinach potpies.

4.title: Count Your Chickens

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Chicken and mushrooms with rigatoni; chicken-and-chorizo Spanish enchiladas; derby-sage macaroni and cheese with ham; Adirondack-bacon barbecue chicken; pick-a-pepper pasta.

5.title: Game On!

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Cincinnati spaghetti; pork-and-broccoli-rabe ciabatta subs; buffalo-turkey sloppy joes; brisket bowls; bacon-burger mac and cheese.

6.title: Soups, Stews and Sloppy Lous

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Potted-beef-and-mushroom soup; vegetable-and-bean soup with stale bread; potato-and-cabbage soup with kielbasa; roasted-eggplant-and-tomato soup; sloppy lous.

7.title: Falling in Love with Fall

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Tricks, Treats and Sweets

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Cinnamon brittle with mixed nuts; ratatouille-stuffed peppers; soup with pumpernickel-grilled-cheese croûtons; pumpkin with penne and cabbage; garlicky beef; ground-meat goulash.

9.title: Thanksgiving Before and After

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Dishes to be enjoyed, before and after Thanksgiving, include barbecue-turkey gumbo; bacon-and-Brussels-sprouts mac; and cheese and egg noodles with turkey, fennel and onions.

10.title: Cold Comforts

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Touchdown chili; roasted turkey breast with creamy gravy and cranberry-pomegranate sauce; curried-squash soup with apple-and-cheddar melts; osso buco; pasta e fagioli with roasted garlic.

11.title: Italian Comfort

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: A week's worth of Italian comfort food to help combat holiday stress. On the menu: braciole and sausage Sunday gravy; cheesy rice cakes stuffed with herbs and greens.

12.title: Season's Servings

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Five holiday meals, including ruby port braised short ribs w/ mashed potatoes; prosciutto-and-pancetta-wrapped pork roast with fennel and golden raisin stuffing; paslitsio with lamb and sausage; winter white coq au vin and risotto timbale.

1.title: Amazing Grains

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Farro with asparagus, hazelnuts and kale topped with roasted mushrooms; quinoa and stuffed peppers; roasted vegetable taboutek; Mexican sliced steak and barley soup; buckwheat soup with porcini, beet and kale.

1.title: More Comforts, Classics and Casseroles

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Rachael Ray has five dishes for comfort food lovers. Italian meatball meatloaf sandwiches; Reuben style casserole w/pastrami meatballs; sauerkraut and barley; deconstructed sweet sausage stuffed peppers; manicotti; creamy fish enchiladas.

4.title: Back in the Day

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Meatloaf meatballs; cream of celery soup; broccoli and croûton casserole; French onion dip soup; chicken a la king.

5.title: Take It to the Bank

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Chunky chicken-vegetable noodle soup; pulled whisky BBQ chicken; rice and beans casserole; panzanella strata; spaghetti with chickpea red sauce.

6.title: Tuscan American

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Prepared: beef and pork Italian chili; potted chicken breasts with lemon and rosemary; zucchini tomato sauce with fat spaghetti; slow simmered beef with potatoes; baked pumpkin and cream pasta.

7.title: A Little of This, a Little of That

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Recipes for chicken and green bean casserole, spicy chicken and rice with almonds, mushroom lovers' marinara, sloppy joes, piazzaiola, bacon and artichoke pasta.

8.title: Some Like It Hot

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Rachael has a fiery feast to satisfy spicy food fans: red-eye chili, Jalapeno chermoula w/penne and flaked fish; meatless taco salad; Indian curried chili oven fries; hot and sticky noodle bowls w/chicken, chilies and green beans.

9.title: Easily Entertained

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: A stress-free soirée includes chutney chicken; potted beef with pears and cipollini onions; braised pork with caraway, apples and onions; mustard and cheddar mashed potatoes; veal ragu with Gorgonzola; fancy fisherman's stew.

10.title: Layer It Up!

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Rachael Ray's got a week stacked with multi-layered meals. Potato, Cauliflower, Broccoli Casserole with Welsh Rarebit Top; Stacked Polenta and Mushroom Casserole; Spinach Lasagna; Toastacho Casserole; Turkey and Stuffing Casserole

11.title: Bowled Over

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Rachael Ray has a week for all the soup lovers out there. Chicken stew with carrots and leeks; vegetable soup with mixed greens; ham, bean and bacon soup with sauerkraut; Spanish meatballs with beans and greens; pork-and-ancho stew.

12.title: Episode #6.12

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot:

13.title: Five Nights of Noodles

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Rachael makes a week's worth of food from a pasta dinner. On the menu: riggies with roasted vegetable and ricotta sauce; pepita and pistachio sauce with roasted squash.

imdb.title: Rachael Ray's Week in a Day
plot: 'Rachael Ray' (qv) shows how to plan a week of meals with one day of cooking.::anonymous
